analysis.description:

	- fee = tokenreg.fee() (/unique_chucks/6/0x9b8eb09a59a180e7798fbe7e099c8c351ac56af0.sol#200)

	- ownedCoins (/unique_chucks/6/0x9b8eb09a59a180e7798fbe7e099c8c351ac56af0.sol#202-207)
